title: The adventures of Zip v1.0
description:
Meet Zip, a rabbit, a hero and a danger to all carrots. Guide your hero through 4 unique worlds and over 40 levels in a quest for rescuing his friends and bringing back peace at the forest. 

Journey through the darkest corners of the Forest, bravely explore the frozen Ice Lands, heroically adventure through the depths of the hidden Caves.
A unique fast-paced yet simple jump and run adventure. 

A game without violence fit for both young and adults. Prepare for an adventure filled with amazing graphics, a hero that awesome he is pink and Carrots!

A new twist on the platforming genre, amazingly simple yet addictive to play. A game inspired by the classics in the genre, a game easy to pick up but not that easy to master, an adventure with an awesome rabbit!

Super simple controls! Just tap on the buttons - Zip will do the rest! DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t forget the carrots though. Zip loves carrots!

Use trampolines to your advantage! Jump to get higher. Jump to run away. Jump to avoid being caught by the bad guys. Jump to collect carrots. Jump because it is fun!

Use the environment! Wake up plants and forest creatures, activate traps or teleport away from trouble (or into).

Run away from the bad guys. More than 10 different bad guys for you to handle!

Explore 4 different gorgeous worlds filled with adventure!

Game features:

+ Unique new twist on the classic platformer gameplay.
+ 4 amazing worlds to explore.
+ Adorable and super heroic rabbit protagonist.
+ More than 10 different bad guys. ( Also adorable )
+ High Definition Graphics.
+ Optimized for all android devices.
+ More than 40 levels!
+ Bonus! Levels.
+ Non-violent gameplay.
+ Addictive!
+ Easy!
+ Fun for both young and adults!
